ModMetaData.name: Ketchup
ModMetaData.author: NanaDaBanana
ModMetaData.description: Adds ketchup to RimWorld! Now your colonists can enjoy tomato-based condiments with their meals. Craft ketchup from tomatoes and enjoy enhanced meal satisfaction. This mod adds tomatoes as a new crop (including both the plant and item) for your colonists to grow, and introduces ketchup bottles as a craftable food item. Note: Using ketchup as a condiment is not implemented yet. More features and content will be added in future updates
